Recursive Definition of Height of Full Binary Tree

  • By Avnish
  • Jun 16, 2021
  • DM

Basis Step: Height of Full Binary Tree $T$ containing a single vertex $r$ is $h(T) = 0$

Recursive Step: If $T_1$ and $T_2$ are Full Binary Tree then $T = T_1 \cdot T_2$ is also a Full Binary Tree with height $h(T) = 1 + max(h(T_1), h(T_2))$

This blog was published directly from my notes. To check the source of my notes visit Sources. To see all of my notes download/clone this repository.
